paper_abstract: In this paper we study the edge-clique cover number, theta(e)(.), of the tensor product K-n, x K-n. We derive an easy lowerbound for the edge-clique number of graphs in general. We prove that, when n is prime theta(e)(K-n x K-n) matches the lowerbound. Moreover, we prove that 0,(1Cn x KO matches the lowerbound if and only if a projective plane of order n exists. We also show an easy upperbound for theta(e) (K-n x K-n) in general, and give its limiting value when the Riemann hypothesis is true. Finally, we generalize our work to study the edge-clique cover-number of the higher-dimensional tensor product K-n x K-n x . . . K-n. (C) 2015 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Edge-clique covers of the tensor product
